t: Amazon Fresh gets new private brand, expanded Prime savings | Retail Dive
s: September 10, 2024 - Amazon announced Tuesday three updates to its Amazon Fresh brand, including the launch of Amazon Saver, a new value-focused private label line, and more discounts for Prime members shopping in-store and online.

2 weeks ago - Amazon Fresh started in 2007 as an invite-only grocery delivery service in Washington. It rolled out its services gradually, targeting specific parts of various metropolitan areas and partnering with local speciality stores for delivery of local items.

t: Amazon Fresh Review: Pros, Cons, and How It Compares
s: August 31, 2022 - Not only does Amazon Fresh allow you to order items from Amazon brands — such as Happy Belly, Fresh Brand, and 365 by Whole Foods Market — but it also offers you access to a variety of products from local and national brands.

t: Amazon Fresh needs to find its identity
s: March 9, 2025 - Consolidate and expand their non WFM brands for Fresh. While at the same time reducing the national brands they are not making enough margin on. Private labels are doing well nationally. Amazon Basics, Happy Belly and Aplenty should have a much larger presence at Fresh.

t: Amazon offering cheaper grocery brand to rival Target, Walmart | Fox Business
s: Amazon rolled out a private label food brand called Amazon Saver to compete with rivals Walmart and Target, which have debuted lower-priced brands over the past year.
